name: Sam's Last Nightmare
description:
Sam's Last Nightmare is a survival horror game that originated as a university project.

The story sets around Samuel Lagos. A survivor of the apocalypse suffering with severe PTSD and being supervised by a mysterious man known only as The Doctor. Sam often talks about the event that haunts him: A night where he tried to save a group of survivors from his hometown hospital. Sam however remembers that night differently every time.

Together with the Doctor's it's your job to uncover what really happened that night and with it the dark truths of this new world.
